name: Cannon Balls
author: CJROGERS
summary: Spicy pork sausage and Cheddar cheese provide a taste explosion in these easy to make little baked balls.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh, ground spicy pork sausage
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large, deep skillet, crumble the sausage and cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
In a medium bowl, stir together the sausage, Cheddar cheese and baking mix
Form the mixture into 1 1/2 inch balls and arrange on a large ungreased cookie sheet
Bake in the preheated oven 10 to 15 minutes, or until cheese is bubbly and baking mix is golden brown
